Investing in Commodities

  1. Dashboard
  2. Select Option
Commodities are raw materials that are either consumed directly, such as food, or used as building blocks to create other products. There are many ways to invest in commodities: You can buy raw products, purchase an Exchange-Trade Product. One of the most traditional commodities that have been traded are precious metals, namely gold and silver, among others. These items have been considered valuable to humankind for thousands of years. To learn more, check out this Extended from physically commodities are Exchange Traded Products, which are securities that are backed by physical commodities.s To learn more about how ETPs work, check out Investopedia's article.
